wikipedia_page.main: David Cross (born 7 September 1982) is an English footballer who played in The Football League for Notts County. His only appearance for County came in a 2–1 defeat away at Chesterfield at the end of the 1999–2000 season.

response: David Cross (born 1964) is an American comedian and actor.
David Cross may also refer to:
* David Cross, British artist from the pair Cornford & Cross
* David Cross (footballer, born 1982), English footballer for Notts County
